thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Gold-Medal Diplomacy
As the Winter Olympics continue in South Korea, diplomatic maneuvers on the peninsula are taking a new turn. Trump administration officials have shifted their tactical approach to North Korea after internal deliberations in recent weeks, closing ranks with Seoul and signaling a readiness to hold preliminary talks with Pyongyang. The new emphasis on what some experts call “talks about talks” is a change from last year, when the U.S. insisted North Korea commit itself to denuclearization before...
